title: Drawing, Design for China Cabinet in Three Views, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for China Cabinet in Three Views
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, below each view respectively: FRONT / SIDE / PLAN; along right edge of elevation and plan and below plan at center, numerical notations indicating dimensions; at lower right of sheet: CHINA CABINET
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Elevation at upper left, side view upper right, plan across bottom of sheet; tall rectangular cabinet with tri-partite glass-front panel, raised on 4 slightly tapering legs.  Side view shows rectangular, narrow profile with  molded frieze-like top.  Plan shows oblong silhouette of cabinet with canted front corners.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for China Cabinet in Three Views, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-228
